fields.name: Everlast Pro Training Gloves
fields.description: The Everlast Pro Training Gloves incorporate closed cell foam technology for superior hand protection and Evercool mesh ventilation panels keep your hands cool so you can train harder and longer.

fields.name: Everlast Pro Training Gloves
fields.description: The Everlast Pro Training Gloves incorporate closed cell foam technology for superior hand protection and Evercool mesh ventilation panels keep your hands cool so you can train harder and longer.

fields.name: Everlast Pro Training Gloves
fields.description: The Everlast Pro Training Gloves incorporate closed cell foam technology for superior hand protection and Evercool mesh ventilation panels keep your hands cool so you can train harder and longer.

fields.name: Lonsdale Boxing Vest Top Mens
fields.description:
This Mens Lonsdale Boxing Vest Top has a scooped neck and sleeveless design for a comfortable and relaxed fit, whilst the printed design on the chest completes the impressive look.

 Men's Sleeveless Top

 Scooped neck

 Lightweight

 Regular fit

 Soft touch material
 Lonsdale branding
 90% Cotton/ 10% Viscose
> Machine washable
> Keep away from fire

fields.name: Under Armour HeatGear Core Long Sleeve Baselayer Mens
fields.description:
This Under Armour HeatGear Core Long Sleeve Baselayer is crafted with long sleeves and a round neck and displays flat lock seams to offer you great comfort that does not irritate or chafe. HeatGear technology assists in keeping you cool and dry by drawing sweat away from the body. Under Armour branding completes the look.

> Please note: The style you receive may vary from the image shown

> Baselayer
> Round neck
> Long sleeves
> Flatlock seams
> HeatGear technology
> Under Armour branding
> 84% polyester, 16% elastane
> Machine washable

fields.name: Lonsdale Box Lightweight Shorts Mens
fields.description:
The classic Lonsdale Box Lightweight Shorts provides a comfortable fit thanks to the lightweight construction, elasticated waist and drawstring fastening, complete with the 2 pockets for improved storage and Lonsdale branding for a great look.

> Please note: The style you receive may vary from the image shown.

> Mens Shorts
> Elasticated waist
> Drawstring
> Regular fit
> True to size
> Classic
> Breathable
> Lightweight
> 2 pockets
> Lonsdale branding
> 60% cotton, 40% polyester
> Machine washable at 30 Degrees
> Keep away from fire

fields.name: Everlast Evercool Headgear
fields.description: Stay protected with the Everlast Evercool Headgear. They benefit from the EVERCOOL and EVERDRI technology to help keep your head cool and wicks sweat away from the skin. Features closed cell technology for maximum protection for your head and is complete with Everlast branding to the front.

fields.name: Everlast Mouthguard
fields.description: The Everlast mouthguard is a must-have when participating in contact sports. Constructed from a moulding material for a custom precise fit to allow you to focus on the game. Complete with Everlast branding on the front.

fields.name: Everlast Protective Cup
fields.description:
Optimise your comfort with this Everlast Protective Cup. Crafted from a soft cotton fabric, this piece feature an elasticated waistband with flat lock seams for comfort and Everlast branding on the waistband to complete the look.

• Jock Strap
• Elasticated waistband
• Low rise
• Regular fit
• Flat lock seams
• Everlast branding
• Pure cotton construction
• Machine washable
• Keep away from fire

fields.name: Everlast Everhide Speed Bag Adults
fields.description:
This Everlast Everhide Speed Bag is constructed with reinforced seams for lasting durability and is balanced for accurate rebounds while training. Built for any speed bag workout, the design is complete with Everlast branding.

> Speed bag
> Reinforced seams
> Balanced
> Everlast branding

fields.name: Lonsdale Club Skipping Rope
fields.description:
The Lonsdale Club Skipping Rope has been designed with a 9ft nylon rope that is ideal for fitness and speed training. This Lonsdale skipping rope also comes with slimline moulded plastic handles for ease of use.

> Please note: The style you receive may vary from the image shown.

> Boxing skipping rope
> 9 ft
> Soft nylon rope
> Moulded plastic handles

fields.name: Geezers Fixed Speedball Platform
fields.description:
Geezers Fixed Speedball Platform - A heavy-duty moulded edge MDF platform is used to ensure accurate re-bounds.

Swivel Included.

fields.name: Elite Head Gaurd Mens
fields.description:
Everlast Elite Head Gaurd Mens
Featuring a premium leather construction with a soft leather liner that absorbs sweat and prevents shifting, designed to provide a second skin like fit while also giving fantastic comfort and protection, the shape has also been engineered for exceptional visbility. Evershield technology and protective padding reinforces safety for training and sparring, completed with the Everlast branding.

fields.name: ADIDAS Hybrid Groin Guard
fields.description:
Built for quality & protection these groin guards will ensure you stay injury free & comfortable during your sessions.
Featuring high density padding & a wide elasticated strap these groin guards will stand the test of time & the punishment it will receive

Shiny PU material
High density padding
Reinforced cup
4 wide elastic strap on the back for closure
CE Approved

fields.name: EVERLAST Gel Handwraps
fields.description:
The Everlast Gel Handwraps offer lightweight comfort and protection thanks to an elasticated touch and close fastener, with a gel cushioned palm and backhand.

> Handwraps
> Breathable mesh backhand panel
> Gel cushioned palm with vent hole
> Elasticated hook and loop fastening

fields.name: ADIDAS 450cm Hand Wraps
fields.description:
adidas 450cm Hand Wraps
The adidas 450cm Hand Wraps are a must for any boxer during training, featuring an elasticated, woven design and a single touch and close fastener, these adidas hand wraps are finished off with the adidas logo to the front.

> Boxing hand wraps
> 450cm
> Woven elasticated design
> Touch and close fastener
> adidas logo

fields.name: EVERLAST Gel Wraps
fields.description:
Everlast Gel Wraps
These Everlast Gel Wraps are a slip on style crafted with touch closure fastening for a secure fit. They feature flat lock seams to prevent chafing and mesh panelling for ventilation. These wraps are designed with a signature logo and are complete with Everlast branding.

> Wraps
> Slip on
> Touch closure fastening
> Flat lock seams
> Soft fabrics
> Lightweight padding
> Soft fabrics
> Comfort fit
> Mesh panelling
> Signature logo
> Everlast branding

fields.name: Lonsdale Chest Guard Womens
fields.description: The Womens Lonsdale Chest Guard is perfect for boxing and MMA training sessions, featuring a lightweight stretch construction with racerback straps and an elasticated chest band for a comfortable fit, lightweight padding to the chest gives shock absorption from impacts, completed with the Lonsdale branding.
